generated.css: .trigger{width:100px;align:center;margin:0 auto}.modal{position:fixed;left:0;top:0;width:100%;height:100%;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,.5);opacity:0;visibility:hidden;transform:scaleX(1.1) scaleY(1.1);transition:visibility 0s linear .25s,opacity .25s 0s,transform .25s;font-family:sans-serif}.modal-content{position:absolute;top:50%;left:50%;transform:translate(-50%,-50%);background:#ebecf1;box-shadow:0 4px 11px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.15),0 11px 26px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.06);border-radius:7.5px;padding:1rem scaleY(1);transition:visibility 0s linear 0s,opacity .25s 0s,transform .25s}.dapp-name{margin:0
